འབོ་ལོ་ཁར་ bolokha, postp., [with the genitive] near, next to.

column3: Dr’âsho — Chö-gi yitsha-gi ma-ngü-di-tshu g’âra thop-ci-ga?

column2: ཀུན་ལེགས་ — ཨཱ་ ནཱ་འོང་པ་ཅིན་སྟེ་ འཕྲང་ཡར་ནདཔ་བཞག་སར་ཤོག་མས། ང་ལཱ་ཡར་ ནདཔ་བཞག་སར་ཨིན།
column3: Kinle — ’Â, nâ ong-macin, te thrang yâ nep zhasa shô’me. Nga lâ yâ nêp zhasa ’ing.
Kinle — ’Eng, meng läzhim dû. Chö-lu ’map yö-ga?
Kinle — ’Wae, chö g’âti-le mo, b’um khore?
Kinle — ’Wae! D’ebe ma’lap ’wae! Ngace-gi g’anee bj’in-ni meba.
Kinle — Chö-gi meng g’aci z’eu mo?
Kinle — D’en ’ai da ’apa yö-ga?
Kinle — Laso.
Kinle — Mê, ’wae! D’ato-le ’amtshu g’âti ong-ni sâ?
Kinle — Nâ, Thimphu ’Menkha-na ’ing.
Kinle — Nam lo jo-ni?
Kinle — Ngace hema ’lopdra cikha ta-yi, me-na?
Kinle — Shô, ’wae! G’â-e mê. Nga-ra câmci-ra ’ing.
Kinle — Te, chö-gi nga ngoshê-ci-ga?
Kinle — Te, d’are chö nâ Thimphu-lu g’ademci-be ôm?
Päm — ’Ai yö. ’Apa mê lâ. ’Apa hema nga chunku-gang-le j’ongso-nu.

column2: དཔལམོ་ — ཨེང་ཨིན་པས་དབའེ། ཨའུ་ཀུན་ལེགས་ཨིན་པས་སྦོ་སྟེ། ཛའི་དབའེ། ད་ ངོ་མ་ཤེསཔ་རང་ཡར་སོ་ནུག། སྟེ་ཕྱག་ལཱ་ག་ཏེ་ཨིནམ།
column3: Päm — ’Eng, ’ime, ’wae! ’Au Kinle ’ime bô te. Dzai! ’Wae! D’a ngo-ma-shêp-ra-yâ-so-nu. Te, châla g’âti ’im.
Päm — ’Eng, läzhim ’ime, ’wae! D’en d’a ngace-e ’menkha-na ômda, tapde-ni-me, ’wae.
Päm — ’Ina? D’en ngace tabura yâ thöng-ong. Chi-na g’â-e me-ga?
Päm — Chog’u tang-ni-be nyoptsho-ci ca-ba ong-ôm ’ing.
Päm — Las, d’en lo jä-ge! D’ari g’ani-e phü-ni mindu.

column2: དཔལམོ་ — ལགས་སོ། ཨའུ་ཀུན་ལེགས་ དེནི་ལོག་ཤུལ་ལས་ སྐུ་གཟུགས་ བཟངམ་འབད་ མཇལ་གེ།
column3: Päm — Laso, ’Au Kinle, D’en lo shü-le kuzuzâm-be jä-ge!
Päm — Mê lâ.
Päm — Nâba nyoptsho-di-tshu cap-zhâ-be ’nâtshe jo-ni ’ing lâ.
Päm — Nga Shâ-le ’ing lâ.

column2: དཔལམོ་ — ངོ་ཤེས་ནི་བཟུམ་ཅིག་འདུག། སྟེ་ ཐེ་རི་འབའ་རི་རང་ མི་ཤེས་པས་ ལགས།
column3: Päm — Ngoshê-ni zumci dû. Te, theribâri-ra mi-shê-be lâ.
Päm — Päm z’eu ’ing lâ.
Päm — Te, ’Au Kinle ’am yö-ga?
Pêma — Zhen g’âra thop-ci lâ. D’ibeuda darim-gi ’ngüpho-gi mangü-di ma-thop lâ.

column2: ཀྲིག་ཀྲི་ triktri, adj., exact, accurate, in order, precise.
ཁ་གསལ་འབད་ khasebe, adv., in great detail.
ཁ་ཐུག་ khâthu, n., [with the verb རྐྱབ་ནི་ cap-ni] coincidental meeting face-to-face, running into each other.
ཁ་ཕྱི་ནི་ kha pchi-ni, vt. [soft], open (something with a mouth’, ཁ་ kha, e.g. a bottle, a jug).
ཁམས་གཙང་ཏོག་ཏོ་ khamtsangtoto, adj., tidy and clean.
ཁམས་དངས་ཏོག་ཏོ་ khamd’angtoto, adj., clean (said of a place);
ཁམས་ལོག་སི་སི་ khamlôsisi, adj., dirty, filthy (of a place).
ཁར་ kha, postp., on, at, in.
ཁུ་ཆ་ khuca, n., [unaspirated c despite orthography] cargo, freight.
ཁུངས་ khung, n., benefit, value, point, purpose.
ཁོ་རེ་ khore, n., term of address to a contemporary.
ག་ཏེ་ g’âti, adv., where, whither, whereto.
ག་ཏེ་ཡང་ g’âtie, adv., anywhere, everywhere, wherever.
ག་དེམ་ཅིག་འབད་ g’ademcibe, adv., how, in which way.
གཅིག་ ci, 1) num., one; 2) indef.art., a, an.
གཅིག་འདི་ cî-di, num. plus art., the one or other.
གཉེན་ ’nyen, n., marriage (with the verb རྐྱབ་ནི་ cap-ni: to get married’).
གནང་ནི་ ’nang-ni, vt.hon., 1) give (from a person of higher standing to someone of lower social standing); 2) solve, alleviate (e.g. a problem).
གནམ་བྱཱ་ ’nambjâ, 1) n., summer; 2) adv., in the summer.
གནམ་ལོ་ ’namlo, n., year according to the Bhutanese calendar.
གནམ་སྲོ་ནི་ ’nam sô-ni, vi. [hard], to fall (of the night).
གནས་བཅག་སྡོད་ནི་ ’näcâ dö-ni, vi. [hard], take up residence, settle down.
གནས་མཇལ་ནི་ ’näjä-ni, vi. [soft], visit a holy place or temple.
གཙོ་བོ་ tsou, adj., real, genuine, actual.
གཞིས་ zhî, n., plot of land.
གཞུང་ zhung, n., government, authorities, administration.
གཟའ་ za, n., day of the week.
གཟིགས་ནི་ zî-ni, vt.hon. [hard], peruse, look through, inspect.
གཡིབ་ནི་ ’üp-ni, vi., hide, hide onself; cf. bâni.
གྱང་ཤུགས་རྐྱབ་ནི་ j’angshu cap-ni, vi., shiver of cold.
གྱོན་ནི་ g’ön-ni, vt., don (men’s clothing), get dressed.
གྲགས་ནི་ dr’â-ni, vi. [hard], become well known, to spread (of fame).
གྲལ་ dr’ä, n., see གྱལ་ g’ä; see གྲལ་ལས་ dr’ä-le.
གྲལ་ལས་ dr’ä-le, postp., [with the genitive] amongst, from amongst.
གྲོལ་ནི་ dr’ö-ni, vi.hon. [soft], finish; cf. རྫོགས་ནི་ dzô-ni.
གླ་ ’la, n., 1) salary; 2) fare; cf. རིན་ rin, གོང་ gong, རིན་གོང་ ringgong.
གླུ་འཐེན་ནི་ ’lu then-ni, vt., sing a song.
གློག་བརྙན་ ’lok’nyen, n., film, video, motion picture.
གསོལ་རས་ söra, n., gift or donation by a person of rank to common people.
གསོལ་རས་ söra, n.hon„ gift, present or donation from a person of higher social status to one of lower social status.
གསོལཝ་བཏབ་ནི་ söu tap-ni, vt., to bow in respect or submission, to ask for mercy.
གོ་སྐབས་ g’okap, n., chance, occassion, opportunity.
གོང་ gong, n., price, rate, fee, fare; cf. རིན་ rin, རིན་གོང་ ringgong, གླ་ ’la.
གོང་མ་ g’ôm, n., important person, man of high social standing.
ཅ་ལ་ cala, n., things, stuff, affairs.
ཆག་ནི་ châ-ni, vi. [hard], break, be or become broken.
ཆགས་ནི་ châ-ni vt. [hard], land (of a bird, plane, snow), perch; settle down upon, precipitate.
ཆར་ཆུ་ châchu, n., the rains, precipitation.
ཆེ་ or ཆེན་ che, adj., big, great.
ཆོ་གུ་ chog’u, n., [with the verb བཏང་ནི་ tang-ni ‘to perform’] prayer service, ritual of worship.
ཆོས་བཞིན་དུ་ chözhind’u, n., righteous rule, just and wise reign
ཆོས་བལྟ་ནི་ chô ta-ni, vt. [soft], read books, study.
ཆོས་བཤད་ནི་ chôshê-ni, vt. [hard], teach, give instruction, explain.
ཆོས་ཞུ་ནི་ chôzh’u-ni, vt. [soft], learn by listening to teachings; cf. chôlhapni.
ཆོས་ལྷབ་ནི་ chôlhap-ni, vt., study; cf. chôzh’uni, chôlhâni
ཉན་ཁུག་བཏབ་ནི་ nyenkhu thap-ni, vt., [with an aspirated th despite the orthography] to be obedient, follow orders, follow instructions.
ཉམས་ནི་ nyam-ni, vi., fall into decay, waste away from neglect.
ཉམས་ནི་ nyam-ni, vi., fall into disuse, fall into decay.
ཉོ་ཚོང་ nyoptsho, n., [with the verb རྐྱབ་ནི་ cap-ni ‘to perform’] shopping.
ཐག་ཆོད་ནི་ thâchö-ni, vi. [hard], be certain that… [takes inflected stem] — cf. thâchöni in Chapter 6.
ཐག་ཆོད་ནི་ thâchö-ni, vi. [hard], be decided that [with postposition འགུར་ gu or complement in འབད་ be].
ཐག་བཅད་ནི་ thâcê-ni, vt. [hard], [with the postposition འགུར་ gu or complement in འབད་ be] decide upon, decide that.
ཐལ་ནི་ thä-ni, vi. [soft], to leave, go away.
ཐུན་བཏང་ནི་ thün tang-ni, vt., recite prayers, chant.
ཐོག་ལས་སྦེ་ thôlebe, postp., [with the genitive] by, through, by means of.
ཐོབ་ནི་ thop-ni, vt., get, acquire, receive.
ད་ལྟོནི་ d’aton, adv., as for now, for the time being.
དཀྱི་རས་ kira, n., Bhutanese female garment.
དགའ་སྐྱིད་ gaki, n., peace and prosperity, well-being.
དང་ da, 1) postp. with; 2) conj., and.
དངོས་ ’ngö, adj., actual, in truth, real.
དཔོན་ pön, n., important personage, VIP.
དར་ཚིལ་ d’âtshi, n., Bhutanese cream cheese.
དྲག་ནི་ dr’â-ni, vi. [hard], get well, be cure, recuperate.
དྲང་ནི་ dr’ang-ni, vt.hon., give (food or hospitality, from a person of lower social status to a person of higher social status); cf. phüni.
དུམ་གྲ་གཅིག་ dumdraci, adv., a little bit, a little, some.
དུས་གཟའ་ d’üza, n., holy days, festival days.
དུས་ཚོད་ d’ütshö, n., time, period of time.
དུས་ལུ་ d’ülu, adv., on time, in time, in a timely fashion.
དེ་ཁར་ d’ikha, adv., there, at that place.
དེ་ཅིག་ or འདེ་ཅིག་ deci, adv., about, approximately.
དེ་མེན་རུང་ d’imenru, adv., otherwise; at least.
དེ་འབད་ d’ebe, adv., like that, in that fashion.
དེ་ལས་ d’ele, adv., and then, and furthermore, moreover.
དོ་རུང་ཡང་ d’oroe, adv., yet another, again, yet again.
དོན་དག་ or དོན་ཐག་ d’önda, n., purpose, reason.
དོན་མེད་ d’önme, n., being without reason.
དོན་ལུ་ d’ön-lu, postp., [with the genitive] for, in order to.
ནགས་སྐྱེས་ nâke, n., fern croziers, sweet fiddleheads [of ferns growing on moist soil; cf. pangke].
ནཱ་ལས་ཕར་ nalephâ, adv., from now on, henceforth.
པ་ནེ་ pane, n., pān, viz. leaves from the pān vine, a vital component of doma.
པ་ནེ་ཀྲོ་དུམ་ pane-trôdum, n., the large-leaf pān, known in
ཕ་སྤད་ phâphe, n., [aspirated ph in the second syllable, despite the orthography; in Chöke: ཕ་བུ་ phab’u] a father with his children; cf. མ་སྤད་ mâphe.
ཕམ་ pham, n., parents, uncles, aunts and relatives of
ཕམ་ནི་ pham-ni, vi., to lose at a game or competition.
ཕམ་སྤུན་ཆ་ pham-pincha, n., family and relatives.
ཕྱག་མཇལ་ chânje, n., gift or offering (of a lowly person to a person of higher standing).
ཕྱག་ཞུ་ནི་ châzh’uni, vt.hon. [soft], accompany someone, be of service to someone, be at someone’s disposal,
ཕྱག་འཚལ་ནི་ châtshä-ni, vi. [soft], prostrate oneself in obeisance.
ཕྱི་རུ་ pchiru, 1) n., evening; 2) adv., in the evening.
ཕྱི་རུ་ཁམས་ pchiru-kham, adv., in the eveningtime.
ཕྱུགཔ་ pchup, 1) adj., rich, wealthy; 2) a rich man.
ཕྱེ་བྱིན་ནི་ pchî bj’in-ni, vt., to settle a matter.
ཕར་དང་ཚུར་ phâ-da-tshû, adv., to and fro, there and back again.
ཕར་འབད་བཞག་ནི་ phâbe zhâ-ni, vt. [hard], forget about it, give it up.
ཕུན་སུམ་ཚོགས་པ་ phünsumtshôba, adj., possessed of the three graces, i.e. wealth, grace and glory; sublime.
ཕུལ་ནི་ phü-ni, vt.hon. [soft], give, proffer (money, an object or a gift, from someone of lower standing to someone of higher standing); cf. dr’angni.
བཀབ་བགོ་ kap-g’ô, n., clothing, clothes to wear.
བཅག་ནི་ câ-ni, vt. [hard], to break something.
བཅོས་ཁ་ côkha, n., reparation, repair work [takes the verb
བཏབ་ནི་ tap-ni, 1) vt., [with ཕྱེད་ཀྲམ་ pchetra ‘money’, བུ་
བཏོན་ནི་ tön-ni, vt., evict, drive off, take out.
བདག་འགན་ dâge, n., professional responsibility, authority, post or official rank.
བདའ་ནི་ da-ni, vt. [soft], 1) chase; 2) take away.
བདེ་ནི་ de-ni, vi. [soft], be in good health.
བཙུག་ནི་ tsû-ni, n., add, put into.
བཙུགས་ནི་ tsû-ni, vt. [hard], put, place, apply.
བཞག་ནི་ zhâ-ni, vt. [hard], 1) put, place; 2) act, arrange; 3) relinquish, give up, stop, cease.
བཞག་སར་ zhasa, n., place where something is kept.
བཞུགས་སར་ zhûsa, n.hon., residence, place of residence.
བཟངམ་ zâm, adj., healthy, amiable, agreeable.
བཟའ་ཚང་ zatsha, n., immediate family; cf. ཕམ་ pham, སྤུན་ཆ་ pincha.
བཟུང་ནི་ zung-ni, vt., hold, grip, clutch.
བཟོ་ནི་ zo-ni, vt. [soft], make, manufacture, repair.
བྱ་ཆིས་ཆི་ bjâchichi, adj., well-shaped, comely, handsome,
བྱ་ཤ་ bj’asha, n., chicken meat, poultry.
བྱ་ཤ་རྔོས་ bj’asha’ngo, n., fried chicken curry.
བྱོག་ནི་ bj’ô-ni, vi. [hard], run, run away.

བརྒྱུད་དེ་ jüdi, postp., [used in combination with the postposition ལས་ lä] ཁྱིམ་ ལས་ ཁྱིམ་ བརྒྱུད་ དེ་ chim-le chim-jü-di from house to house, རྒྱལ་ཁབ་ལསརྒྱལ་ ཁབ་བརྒྱུད་དེ་ gäkhap-le gäkhap-jü-di from country to country, etc.
བརྟག་ཞིབ་ takzh’i, n., comparative study, investigation, checking something out beforehand, background study.
བརྟག་ཞིབ་དཔྱད་ནི་ takzh’i cê-ni, vt. [hard], investigate, check something out; cf. zh’ipce cap-ni.
བརྟེན་ཏེ་ tendi, adv., [with ལས་ lä] caused or sustained by; on account of.
བརྟེན་ནི་ ten-ni, n., depend on something for income, make a living from; cause, sustain.
བརྡུང་ནི་ dung-ni, vt., hit, strike, slam.
བརྡུང་སག་ས་ dungsasa, adv., making motions as if to hit or strike, threatening to hit or strike.
བརྩམ་ནི་ tsam-ni, vt., fashion a plan, work out in detail, outline.
བརྩོན་ཤུགས་བཏོན་ནི་ tsönshu tön-ni, vt., (with an optional complement in ལུ་ ‑lu) be diligent at something, be assiduous at something.
བློ་ཕམ་ནི་ ’lopham-ni, vi., be disappointed, be crestfallen.
བསྐྱངས་མི་ cangmi, n., ruler, he who rules.
བསྒྲུབ་ནི་ drup-ni, vt., complete, achieve, bring to fruition, attain.
བསམ་པ་ samba, n., disposition, character, personality.
མ་ཏོགས་ mato, adv., unless, only if.
མ་ཚད་ matshe, adv., not only; cf. mitshê.
མ་འགྲིགས་ནི་ madrî-ni, vi. [hard], to argue, to disagree.
མ་འདྲཝ་འབད་ madraube, adv., differently, in an unusual fashion.
མ་སྤད་ mâphe, n., [aspirated ph in the second syllable, despite the orthography; in Chöke: མ་བུ་ mab’u]  mother with her children; cf. ཕ་སྤད་ phâphe.
མགུ་ན་ན་ gunana, adv., so much so or so intensely that one’s head starts to ache.
མང་རབས་ mangrap, adj., a great deal of, a lot, a large amount.
མཆོག་ chô, postp.hon., honorific suffix attached to the
མཆོད་ནི་ chö-ni, vt. [hard], perform religious rituals, make offerings.
མཇལ་ནི་ jä-ni, vi. [soft], measure; to apportion.
མཇུག་བསྡུ་ནི་ jûdu-ni, vt. [soft], finish [a task], complete.
མཐའ་མཇུག་ཁར་ thanjukha, adv., at last, finally.
མཐའ་མར་ thama, postp., [with the genitive] nearby, on the outskirts of, alongside.
མཐོ་གང་ thog’ang, n., Bhutanese unit of measure equivalent to the distance between the tip of the thumb and the tip of the ring finger when outstretched.
མཐོ་དྲག་ thodr’a, n., highest vantage point, summit, ridge.
མཐོ་ནི་ tho-ni, vi. [soft], to be expensive.
མདའ་ཕམ་ནི་ da pham-ni, vi., to lose at archery.
མཚན་ཉིད་ tshenyi, n., debate, learned dispute.
མར་ཁུ་ mâkhu, n., oil, grease [esp. for baking and frying].
མི་དབང་ Mi’wang, n., His Majesty [as a term of reference, not as a term of address].
མི་ཚད་ mitshê, adv., not only; cf. matshe.
མེདཔ་བཏང་ནི་ meptang-ni, vt., spoil, mess up, ruin.
ཚ་ཆུ་ tshachu, n., natural hot water spring; cf. dotso.
ཚ་ནི་ tsha-ni, vi. [soft], 1) burn, sting, be overly spicy; 2) [of the eyes མིག་ཏོ་ ’mito] be jealous.
ཚངམ་འབད་ tshâmbe, adv., in full, completely.
ཚུད་ནི་ tshü-ni, vi. [hard], land [somewhere], end up [in a place].
ཚུན་ཚོད་ tshöntshö, postp., until, as far as.
ཚེས་ tshê, n., date of the Bhutanese month.
ཚོ་སྡོར་ tshôto, n., oil [as an additive, as opposed to མར་ཁུ་ mâkhu].
ཚོདམ་ tshöm, n., curry as a side dish to the rice.
ཞྭམོ་ zh’am, n., cap, hat, helmet, headdress.
ཞལ་ཐག་ zh’ätha, n., stupid mistake, blunder, embarrassing situation.
ཞལ་ཐག་དཔྱང་ནི་ zh’ätha pcang-ni, vt., make a stupid mistake, pull an oafish blunder, get oneself into an embarrassing situation.
ཞལ་ཐག་རྐྱལ་ཅུ་ zh’ätha-käcu, n., [literally ‘blunder receptacle’] dunce, oaf.
ཞིནམ་ལས་ zh’ile, postp., after having [suffixed to a verb].
ཞིབ་དཔྱད་རྐྱབ་ནི་ zh’ipce cap-ni, vt., inspect, conduct an inspection.
ཞིམ་ནི་ zh’im-ni, vi., to be delicious.
ཟ་ནི་ z’ani, vi. [soft], be aroused [of རྩིགཔ་ tsip ‘anger’].
ཟ་བའི་ལྟོ་ z’awi-to or z’au-to, n., food, sustenance [literally rice for eating’].
ཟཔ་ zap, n., [with a hard initial consonant despite the lack of ’nyönju] slave.
ཟླ་རིམ་ darim, n., month, monthly programme.
འཁྱིད་ནི་ khî-ni, vt. [hard], lead, escort; take [a person by the hand or an animal on a leash].
འགྱོ་མི་ jo-mi, adj., going, wandering; he who wanders
འགུར་ gu, postp., [with the genitive] on, upon.
འགོ་ gu, n., [with a different vowel than in traditional orthography] time, occasion.
འགོ་དཔོན་ gupön, n., boss, head, director.
འགོ་བཙུགས་ནི་ gutsû-ni, vt. [hard], to start, commence.
འཐུ་ནི་ thu-ni, vt. [soft], pick up, lift.
འཐུད་ཤོར་ནི་ thüshô-ni, vt. [soft], [with the bound morpheme འཐུད་ thü ‘harmony, accord’] make a mess of things, fudge something, spoil or bungle, fail; err, make a mistake.
འཐོན་ནི་ thön-ni, vi., 1) come out, exude; 2) [with ཁྲག་ thrâ] bleed; 2) [with དངུལ་ནག་ ’ngina] sweat, perspire.
འདམ་རུ་ damru, n., leafy vegetable which grows in marsh
འདྲོགས་ནི་ drô-ni, vt. [hard], be afraid of, fear
འཕྲུལ་ thrü, n., 1) engine, machine, motor, apparatus; 2) magic, artifice, strange effect.
འབག་མི་ bâ-mi, n., porter, coolie (see Chapter 8).
འབབ་ནི་ b’ap-ni, vi., to fall, to be poured.
འབྲུག་སྒྲ་ drûdra, n., roar of the dragon.
འབོ་ནི་ b’ô-ni, vi. [hard], crow [said of a cock].
འཚོལ་ནི་ tshö-ni, vt. [soft], search, look for, seek.
འཛོམ་ནི་ dzom-ni, vi., assemble, get together.
འུར་སྒྲ་ ûdra, n., hollow echo, fluttering noise, zoom of a plane, sound of incessant bawling.
འོག་ཐོག་ otho, 1) adv., downstairs; 2) n., downstairs floor.
ཡངན་ yân, adv., same as ཡང་ཅིན་ (see Chapter 6).
ཡར་ yâ, adv., up, above, upward.
རྐྱ་སེང་སེང་ casengse, adj., well-lit, illuminated, light.
རྒྱུ་ཅ་ལ་ jucala, n., material possessions and things.
རྒྱུ་ནོར་ juno, n., wealth and livestock.
རང་ ra, part., particle stressing preceding element in the sentence.
རང་རང་ rangra, pro.adj., own, one’s own.
རྟ་ནོར་སེམས་ཅན་ tano-semce, n., livestock and small farm animals.
རྟས་ཐག་ tätha, n., stick with which to beat someone.
རྡོ་ཕུག་ dophu, n., boulder [as immobile part of a rock
རྡོ་བཙོ་ dotso, n.,outdoor bath heated by tossing glowing red rocks into the tub; cf. tshachu.
རྡོ་མ་ doma, n., 1) Areca nut (Nep. supārī); 2) condiment made of the Areca nut wrapped in pān leaves
རྡོ་སྦོམ་ do bôm, n. + adj., boulder, large rock.
རྩ་ལས་རང་ tsalera, adv., definitely, really, certainly.
རྩུ་ནེ་ tsine, n., lime (Nep. cūna), an important ingredient in doma.
རྩེདམ་རྩེད་ནི་ tsêm tse-ni, vi. [soft], play, horse around.
རྫུན་ནི་ dzün-ni, vi., to be at fault.
རྫོགས་ནི་ dzô-ni, vi. [hard], finish; cf. གྲོལ་ནི་ dr’ö-ni.
རའི་ ri, part., genitive form of the stress particle ra.
རི་ཁར་ riga, adv., in the forest, in the jungle.
རི་དྭགས་ rida, n., beasts, savage creatures.
རིང་ ring, postp., [with the genitive] for (a duration of time), until.
རིན་ rin, n., price, amount, rate; cf. རིན་གོང་ ringgong,
རིན་གོང་ ringgong, n., price, amount, rate, fee; cf. རིན་ rin, གོང་ gong, གླ་ ’la.
རུབ་སྟེ་ rupdi, adv., altogether [past participle of རུབ་ rup pitch in, get together, join in a fray’].
རེ་ re, adv., one each, apiece.
རེ་རེ་ rere, adv., each one, every one.
ལག་པར་ laba [< ལགཔ་ lap ‘hand’], n., in hand, at hand.
ལག་པར་ laba, adv., in one’s hand.
ལང་ནི་ lang-ni, 1) vi., be enough, suffice; 2) vt., to occasion, to inflict, to cause, to bring forth, to emit.
ལངམ་འབད་ lâmbe, adv., sufficiently, in sufficient quantity.
ལྟོ་རས་ tôra, n., cloth in which to wrap the bowls (phôp) to be carried inside one’s b’angcu.
ལྟོཝ་བཀྱེས་ནི་ tou kê-ni, vi. [hard], be hungry, get hungry.
ལམ་འགྱོ་ནི་ lamjo-ni, vi. [soft], walk, go on foot.
ལམ་ཡིག་ lamyi, n., road permit, special permit.
ལས་བསག་ནི་ läsâ-ni, vi. [hard], commit a sin, incur a sin.
ལཱ་འགན་ lâgen, n., work, official work, duty.
ལཱ་སྐོར་ lâko, n., work, programme of activities, duties.
ལཱ་སར་ lâsa, n., place of work.
ལུས་ནི་ lü-ni [hard], 1) vt., to abandon, postpone; 2) vi. to stay behind.
ལུས་ནི་ lü-ni, vi. [hard], remain, be left behind.
ལོག་ནི་ lôni, adv., return (stem shortens to lo in ལོགཔ་ད་ lopda ‘returning’).
ལོངས་སྤྱོད་ནི་ longcö-ni, vt. [hard], assume, appropriate, enjoy the fruits or benefit of.
ལོན་ b’ölö ‘loan’] pay; repay, bay back; 2) vi., get caught in, get ensnared (e.g. on a hook, in an awkward situation).
ལོམ་ lôm, n., dried höntshö, used as a vegetable in making one type of Bhutanese curry.
ཤ་བདའ་ནི་ shada-ni, vi. [soft], hunt, go hunting.
ཤུལ་ལས་ shüle, adv., later on, afterwards.
ཤོབ་རྐྱབ་ནི་ shop cap-ni, vt., to lie.
ས་ཐ་ satha, n., veranda of a traditional Bhutanese house.
ས་ཞིང་ sazh’i, n., land, tract of land.
ས་སྟོང་ sâto, n., a deserted place, an empty or vacant lot of land.
སྐད་ kê, n., 1) sound, noise; 2) language; 3) [with the verb རྐྱབ་ cap] shout, emit noise.
སྐྱིད་པ་ kiba or སྐྱིདཔ་ kip, adj., peaceful.
སྐྱིད་སྡུག་ kîdu, n., 1) payment made in compensation for some loss; 2) loss, discomfort, problem, worries.
སྐྱེས་ནི་ ke-ni, vi. [soft], 1) to be born, 2) to germinate,
སྐྱོ་སྐྱོཝ་ cocou, adv., bad-looking, in a bad way, incapable, good for nothing.
སྐུ་མདུན་ kundü, n.hon., the presence [of a person of high status].
སྐུ་རྟེན་ kuten, n., religious image or idol.
སྒང་ gang, I) 1) postp., during; 2) n., period, time, duration; II) n., hill, slope.
སྒྱིད་སྡུག་ gîdu, 1) adj., idle, lazy; 2) n., lethargy, laziness.
སྒྲིག་ནི་ drî-ni, n., arrange, prepare, get into the proper arrangement.
སྔུ་རལ་འཐབ་ནི་ ’ngurä thap-ni, vi., to bawl, cry hysterically.
སྟབས་བདེ་ནི་ tapde-ni, vi. [soft], be convenient, be all right.
སྟབས་སྒྲིག་ནི་ tapdrî-ni, vi. [hard], to be feasible, be practicable, (of activities) be combinable.
སྟེ་ te, adv., and then, so, moreover, well.
སྟོང་བཏབ་ནི་ tong tap-ni, vt., pay the fine for involuntary manslaughter (= སྟོང་ tong).
སྟོངམ་ tôm, adj., abandoned, deserted, empty.
སྡོད་ནི་ dö-ni, vi. [hard], 1) sit, remain, stay, live, reside;
སྡོད་སར་ dösa, n., place of residence.
སྤང་སྐྱེས་ pangke, n., fern croziers, bitter fiddleheads [of ferns growing on dry soil; cf. nâke].
སྤྱ་དཀར་ pcaka, n., [literally ‘white monkey’] golden langur.
སྤྱང་འཁྱམས་ནི་ pcangchamni, n., be a freeloader, wander about like an itinerant scrounger.
སྤུན་ཆ་ pincha, n., cousins, siblings and relatives in one’s
སྦ་ནི་ bâ-ni, vt. [soft], hide, conceal; cf. ’üpni.
སྦང་ནི་ bang-ni, vi., to get into [a tub or bath].
སྨས་ ’mä, interj., sentence-final particle expressing a friendly entreaty on the part of the speaker.
སློབམ་ ’lôm, n., disciple, follower of a spiritual teacher.
སེང་གེ་དཀརམོ་ singge kâm, n., 1) mythological white lion; 2) snow leopard.
སེན་མོ་ sêmu, n., [with the verb བཏབ་ནི་ tapni] pinch.
སེམས་ཁར་འབབ་ནི་ semkha b’ap-ni, vt., [literally ‘pour into the heart’] to be pleased with, be satisfied with.
སེམས་ཆགས་ནི་ semchâ-ni, vt. [hard], be infatuated by, be enthralled by.
སེར་གུ་ sêgu, n., split, space between.
སོ་བཏབ་ནི་ so tapni, vt., to bite.
ཧ་གོ་ནི་ hag’o-ni, vi. [soft], understand, make out.
ཧ་ལམ་ halam, ཧ་ལམ་ཅིག་ halamci, adv., almost, nearly.
ཧ་ལས་ནི་ halä-ni, vi. [hard], be astounded, be surprised.
ཧིང་སངས་སང་ hingsangsa, adj., clean (with respect to corporeal
ཧེང་བཀལ་ hengke, adv., on top of that, to boot, in addition.
ཧོན་ཚོད་ höntshö, n., a particular leafy spinach-like vegetable.
ཨ་ཙི་གཅིག་ ’atsici, adv., a little bit, a little.
ཨའུ་ ’au, n., term of address to someone slightly older than oneself.
ཨརཝ་རྐུ་ནི་ ’âuku-ni, vt. [soft], steal [from someone, with the postposition ལས་ lä].
ཨེན་ཏ་ ’entha, n., [with an aspirated th despite the orthography] floorboard.
